Claim.name: Claim
Claim.description: Represents a warranty Claim submitted by a partner to a manufacturer, or a supplier recovery claim submitted by the manufacturer to a supplier.

AccountId.description: The ID of the account related to the claim.

ClaimReason.description: The reason for initiating the claim.

ClaimReasonType.description: The category to which the claim reason belongs.

FinalizedDate.description: The date on which the claim was marked resolved, with claim status as approved or rejected.

FnolChannel.description: The channel through which the loss was reported.

IsClosed.description: Indicates whether the claim has been closed (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, itâ€™s possible that this record was referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The claim number in the claims management system.

RelatedClaimId.description: ID of the claim related to this claim.

TotalAdjustedAmount.description: The claim amount that was approved.

UsageType.description: The usage type of the Claims record.
